title: The World Desperately Needs Good Dads
itunes:author: Guests: Joe Battaglia & Joe Pellegrino
itunes:summary:
Dads don't have to be perfect to positively influence their kids. John and Danny discuss how men can embrace their role in the family. Featuring Joe Battaglia and Joe Pellegrino.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.
